mapper.sql: ID, A0100, B0100, YSP_ID, YSPDW_ID, AGE, POLITICAL_AFF, JOB, HEALTH, SFSMRY, SMDJ, NSSJ, YSMDJ1, YTMJSSJ1, YSMDJ2, YTMJSSJ2, ZTDW, ZTNRZW, CGSJ, HGSJ, SDGJ, TLSJ, CFRW, CFSY, CGSPDW, PWH, ZYPWH, ZJCGQK, SJCGSJ, SJHGSJ, NFGS, SFYSP, SFZQJWYJ, SCZQJWYJSJ, SFBCZQJWYJ, JWJL, CLSHSFTG, JDCJL, SFZYLD, SFLG, POZNSJD, FMXX, DWJSXS, ZZJL, CXYY, SFTSRY, SFZB, SFBG, SQZT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_ID, BAH
mapper.update:
update oms_pub_apply
A0100 = #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B0100 = #{b0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YSP_ID = #{yspId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YSPDW_ID = #{yspdwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLITICAL_AFF = #{politicalAff,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEALTH = #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFSMRY = #{sfsmry,jdbcType=CHAR},
SMDJ = #{smdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NSSJ = #{nssj,jdbcType=DATE},
YSMDJ1 = #{ysmdj1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YTMJSSJ1 = #{ytmjssj1,jdbcType=DATE},
YSMDJ2 = #{ysmdj2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YTMJSSJ2 = #{ytmjssj2,jdbcType=DATE},
ZTDW = #{ztdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZTNRZW = #{ztnrzw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CGSJ = #{cgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
HGSJ = #{hgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SDGJ = #{sdgj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TLSJ = #{tlsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFRW = #{cfrw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFSY = #{cfsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CGSPDW = #{cgspdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZYPWH = #{zypwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJCGQK = #{zjcgqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJCGSJ = #{sjcgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SJHGSJ = #{sjhgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
NFGS = #{nfgs,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFYSP = #{sfysp,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFZQJWYJ = #{sfzqjwyj,jdbcType=CHAR},
SCZQJWYJSJ = #{sczqjwyjsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SFBCZQJWYJ = #{sfbczqjwyj,jdbcType=CHAR},
JWJL = #{jwjl,jdbcType=CHAR},
CLSHSFTG = #{clshsftg,jdbcType=CHAR},
JDCJL = #{jdcjl,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFZYLD = #{sfzyld,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFLG = #{sflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
POZNSJD = #{poznsjd,jdbcType=CHAR},
FMXX = #{fmxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DWJSXS = #{dwjsxs,jdbcType=CHAR},
ZZJL = #{zzjl,jdbcType=CHAR},
CXYY = #{cxyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFTSRY = #{sftsry,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFZB = #{sfzb,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFBG = #{sfbg,jdbcType=CHAR},
SQZT = #{sqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
SORT_ID = #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BAH = #{bah,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PWH = #{pwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OMS_PERSONINFO P where p.b0100=#{b0100}

select distinct concat(p.SURNAME,p.NAME) as NAME ,p.SEX ,p.BIRTH_DATE ,CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,p.BIRTH_DATE,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d')),'') as AGE ,p.POLITICAL_AFFI ,p.HEALTH ,p.A0100 ,p.SECRET_LEVEL ,p.NF ,i.JOB ,i.B0100 ,i.B0101 from oms_reg_procpersoninfo p inner join oms_personinfo i on p.a0100=i.a0100 where i.b0100=#{b0100} and i.a0100=#{a0100}

select oms_pub_apply.ID ,oms_pub_apply.CGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.HGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFRW ,oms_pub_apply.SDGJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFSY ,oms_pub_apply.JOB ,oms_pub_apply.CREATE_TIME ,oms_pub_apply.SMDJ ,oms_pub_apply.FMXX ,oms_pub_apply.SFBG ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.sflg,'0') as "SFLG" ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.sfzyld,'0') as "SFZYLD" ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.sfbg,'0') as "SFBG" ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.SFZYLD,'0') as "SFZYLD" ,GETDICTITEM('300',oms_pub_apply.SQZT,'0') as "SQZT" ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFI from oms_pub_apply inner join oms_b01_temp on oms_pub_apply.b0100=oms_b01_temp.b0100 left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.a0100=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.a0100 where oms_b01_temp.batch_id=#{batchId} and oms_pub_apply.SQZT!='0' order by oms_pub_apply.SQZT,oms_pub_apply.cgsj

select concat(b.SURNAME,b.name) as "NAME" ,b.SEX,b.BIRTH_DATE,a.POLITICAL_AFF,b1.B0101,a.JOB,a.HEALTH ,GETDICTITEM('37',a.SFSMRY,'0') as "SFSMRY",a.SMDJ,a.NSSJ ,a.YSMDJ1,a.YTMJSSJ1,a.YSMDJ2,a.YTMJSSJ2,a.ZTDW,a.ZTNRZW,a.CGSJ ,a.HGSJ,a.SDGJ,a.TLSJ,a.CFRW,a.CGSPDW,a.PWH,a.ZJCGQK from oms_pub_apply a inner join oms_reg_procpersoninfo b on a.a0100=b.a0100 inner join b01 b1 on a.b0100=b1.b0100 where a.id=#{applyId}

select concat(r.SURNAME,r.name) as "NAME",r.SEX,r.BIRTH_DATE,b.B0101 ,o.* from oms_pub_apply o inner join oms_reg_procpersoninfo r on o.a0100=r.a0100 inner join b01 b on o.b0100=b.b0100 where o.id=#{id}

select oms_pub_apply.ID ,oms_pub_apply.CGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.HGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFRW ,oms_pub_apply.SDGJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFSY ,oms_pub_apply.JOB ,oms_pub_apply.CREATE_TIME ,oms_pub_apply.SMDJ ,oms_pub_apply.FMXX ,oms_pub_apply.SFBG ,oms_pub_apply.sflg ,oms_pub_apply.sfzyld ,oms_pub_apply.SFZYLD ,oms_pub_apply.SQZT ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFI from oms_pub_apply inner join oms_b01_temp on oms_pub_apply.b0100=oms_b01_temp.b0100 left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.a0100=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.a0100
and oms_pub_apply.SQZT in
#{sqzt}
and concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and oms_pub_apply.CGSJ >= to_date(#{cgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and oms_pub_apply.HGSJ <= to_date(#{hgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and oms_pub_apply.ZTDW = #{ztdw}
and oms_pub_apply.pwh like CONCAT('%',#{pwh},'%')

select oms_pub_apply.ID ,oms_pub_apply.CGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.HGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFRW ,oms_pub_apply.SDGJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFSY ,oms_pub_apply.JOB ,oms_pub_apply.CREATE_TIME ,oms_pub_apply.SMDJ ,oms_pub_apply.FMXX ,oms_pub_apply.SFBG ,oms_pub_apply.sflg ,oms_pub_apply.sfzyld ,oms_pub_apply.SFZYLD ,oms_pub_apply.SQZT ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFI from oms_pub_apply inner join oms_b01_temp on oms_pub_apply.b0100=oms_b01_temp.b0100 left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.a0100=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.a0100
and oms_pub_apply.PWH = #{pwh}

select oms_pub_apply.ID ,oms_pub_apply.CGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.HGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFRW ,oms_pub_apply.SDGJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFSY ,oms_pub_apply.JOB ,oms_pub_apply.CREATE_TIME ,oms_pub_apply.SMDJ ,oms_pub_apply.FMXX ,oms_pub_apply.SFBG ,oms_pub_apply.sflg ,oms_pub_apply.sfzyld ,oms_pub_apply.SFZYLD ,oms_pub_apply.SQZT ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFI ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.IDNUMBER from oms_pub_apply inner join oms_b01_temp on oms_pub_apply.b0100=oms_b01_temp.b0100 left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.a0100=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.a0100
and oms_pub_apply.YSP_ID = #{yspId}
